messages.subject: [unschoolingbasics] just sharing this mornings blog
messages.msgSnippet: ... Well it *is* saved at her blog. :o) But I agree, it s needs more opportunities for viewing. I just sent it to my local list. You have a website Ren... --
messages.messageBody:
>>That was a really COOL analogy Sandra!! Love it. It should be saved at a website somewhere....>>

Well it *is* saved at her blog. :o) But I agree, it's needs more opportunities for viewing. I just sent it to my local list. You have a website Ren...

--
~Mary
http://zenmommasgarden.blogspot.com/

"The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the
green earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly
alive."
~Thich Nhat Hanh

messages.subject: just sharing this mornings blog
messages.msgSnippet: Only in the school years do people forget that we humans are part of nature too. All of a sudden we are plucking and pulling on their feathers, trying
messages.messageBody:
"Only in the school years do people forget that we humans are part of
nature too. All of a sudden we are plucking and pulling on their
feathers, trying deseperately to get them to be up to par with other
human children and making themselves and their children feel like
failures."

That was a really COOL analogy Sandra!! Love it. It should be saved at
a website somewhere....

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
